title: The Odyssey
author: Homer
quote: "Of all creatures that breathe and move upon the earth, nothing is bred that is weaker than man."
details: The Odyssey is an epic poem by Homer about Odysseus's journey home after the Trojan War. The poem is traditionally attributed to the ancient Greek poet Homer. The poem is in 24 books and covers only the final six weeks of Odysseus's 10-year journey.
